lead_paragraph: Kevin Love missed Game Three of the NBA Finals with a concussion but he still had a major impact in the Cleveland Cavaliers' critical victory as his team mates used his injury as a source of inspiration.

headline.print_headline: Cavs Use Love's Absence as Motivation in NBA Finals
headline.main: Cavs Use Love's Absence as Motivation in NBA Finals

snippet: Kevin Love missed Game Three of the NBA Finals with a concussion but he still had a major impact in the Cleveland Cavaliers' critical victory as his team mates used his injury as a source of inspiration....
